content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Ah, Mr. Rahman, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment for rental. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains, so I would like to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what your budget is for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 300 Euros per month. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am willing to negotiate a lower rental price. Let's say the current rental price is 400 Euros per month.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Rahman. Based on the current rental price of 400 Euros per month, I am willing to accept your offer of 300 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price that takes into consideration your budget as a student and my goal of maximizing my gains as a landlord. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we finalize the rental agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, that's all. I agree to the price of 300 Euros per month.
TERMINATE.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you, Mr. Rahman, for agreeing to the rental price of 300 Euros per month. I am glad we could come to an agreement that works for both of us. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. Have a great day!
name: Heinrich Heine
